docs.lead_paragraph: INTERNATIONAL A3-15 Salinas Is Convicted In 1994 Assassination Raul Salinas de Gortari, the brother of Mexico's former President, was convicted of ordering the 1994 assassination of a prominent politician and sentenced to 50 years in prison. The verdict shattered the impunity that shielded powerful Mexicans for decades. A1
